about_the_game:
Fragile Peace is a simple yet very challenging strategy game which displays an anachronistic European Union. You control the Union, and must take your stance on numerous issues that arise in Europe, ranging from corrupt governments to immigrant crises and beyond. Many of the events are based on real-life events that have taken place in recent years. If your resources run out or member states grow angry, it's over.

FEATURES

  • large number of Events where you can react in two different ways. You can never be quite sure which decision is the best in the long run, and must adapt to the ever-changing game

  • Events include real-life world events that have taken place over the game's production cycle. They will appear in the game sometime in their real time frames

  • simple to learn, very hard to master: balance your resources while simultaneously trying to keep all the member states happy. Can you keep the Union standing for even a decade in the tumultuous era we live in?

  • lots of post-game achievements and statistics

short_description: In Fragile Peace, you are the European Union and are confronted with multiple political dilemmas that appear at certain intervals. These 'Events' can be resolved one way or another - but each decision has a consequence.
